destinationsSection.subtitle: Start with curated escapes that meet conservation goals and uplift local champions.

destinations.name: Perhentian Islands
destinations.description: Crystal-clear waters, thriving coral gardens, and marine conservation projects led by local NGOs.

destinations.name: Belum Rainforest Reserve
destinations.description: Ancient rainforest teeming with wildlife, eco-lodges, and guided treks with Orang Asli naturalists.

destinations.name: Kota Kinabalu Wetlands
destinations.description: Urban mangrove haven offering boardwalk trails and birdwatching while funding habitat restoration.

tipsSection.title: Small changes, lasting impact
tipsSection.subtitle: Empower your itinerary with mindful habits that protect wildlife, steward resources, and amplify local voices.

travelTips: Pack reef-safe sunscreen and reusable essentials for plastic-free adventures.
Offset your carbon footprint by supporting Malaysian reforestation programmes.
Respect cultural norms and learn simple Malay phrases to connect with hosts.
Book with tour operators certified by Travelife or the Global Sustainable Tourism Council.
